mapper.select: SELECT film_id filmid, original_title title, popularity, poster_path poster FROM fm_film ORDER BY popularity DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.rno rno, B.film_id filmid, C.nickname nickname, A.rate rate, A.content content, A.insert_ts insertTs, A.like_cnt likeCnt, A.comment_cnt commentCnt, to_char(B.release_date, 'YYYY') year, B.original_title title, B.poster_path poster, A.rate * 20 width FROM fm_review A LEFT OUTER JOIN fm_film B ON A.film_id = B.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN fm_user C ON A.writer = C.user_id WHERE A.insert_ts > current_date - 7 ORDER BY A.like_cnt DESC, A.comment_cnt DESC, A.rate DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
